chamonix.title: Chamonix
chamonix.description: One of my favorite mountain towns, nestled dramatically beneath Mont Blanc. The mix of charming alpine architecture and towering peaks creates endless photo opportunities.

italy.title: Italy
italy.description: Italy holds a special place in my heart as a photographer. From the warm light on Renaissance facades to dramatic Dolomite peaks, every corner of this country feels like it was made to be photographed.

cinque-terre.title: Cinque Terre
cinque-terre.description: I never tire of photographing these five vibrant villages clinging to the cliffs. The way the pastel buildings catch the sunset light is pure magic.

dolomites.title: Dolomites
dolomites.description: These jagged peaks have challenged me as a photographer and climber. The dramatic light at sunrise and sunset transforms them into something otherworldly.

florence.title: Florence
florence.description: Walking these historic streets with my camera never gets old. The Renaissance architecture and Tuscan light create endless possibilities for urban photography.

nepal.title: Nepal
nepal.description: Nepal changed how I see the world as a photographer. From the world's highest peaks to the warmth of its people, every day here brings new visual inspiration.

kathmandu.title: Kathmandu
kathmandu.description: The organized chaos of Nepal's capital offers incredible street photography. I love getting lost in the maze of ancient alleyways and temples.

manaslu-circuit.title: Manaslu Circuit
manaslu-circuit.description: My favorite trek in Nepal. The remote trails and traditional villages offer a glimpse into mountain life that few get to photograph.

mardi-himal.title: Mardi Himal
mardi-himal.description: This lesser-known trek has become my go-to for capturing the Annapurnas. The morning light on Machapuchare from high camp is unforgettable.

pokhara.title: Pokhara
pokhara.description: My favorite place to recharge between treks. Capturing reflections of the Annapurnas in Phewa Lake never gets old.

three-passes-trek.title: Three Passes Trek
three-passes-trek.description: The most challenging and rewarding photography adventure I've undertaken in the Himalayas. Each pass offers stunning new perspectives of Everest and its neighbors.

south-korea.title: South Korea
south-korea.description: I'm constantly amazed by South Korea's photographic contrasts. From peaceful temple dawns to electric nights in Seoul, there's always something compelling to capture.

seoul.title: Seoul
seoul.description: I love photographing how this city seamlessly blends old and new. You can capture a centuries-old palace and a futuristic skyscraper in the same frame.

tanzania.title: Tanzania
tanzania.description: As a wildlife photographer, Tanzania feels like paradise. The endless savannas and incredible diversity of animals have provided some of my most memorable shoots.

lake-eyasi.title: Lake Eyasi
lake-eyasi.description: This otherworldly salt lake has challenged me to think differently about landscape composition. The patterns here are unlike anywhere else.

ngorongoro-crater.title: Ngorongoro Crater
ngorongoro-crater.description: My favorite spot for sunrise photography in Africa. Watching the morning mist clear to reveal this ancient caldera teeming with wildlife is breathtaking.

serengeti.title: Serengeti
serengeti.description: Early morning game drives have given me some of my favorite wildlife shots ever. There's nothing quite like capturing lions lounging in those iconic umbrella acacia trees at sunset - it's like a real-life Lion King scene. The endless plains dotted with tree silhouettes against the orange sky make even simple compositions feel epic.

tarangire.title: Tarangire
tarangire.description: I love photographing the ancient baobabs here. Their massive silhouettes against the sunset sky, often with elephants in frame, create epic compositions.

united-states.title: United States
united-states.description: My home country continues to amaze me with its photographic diversity. From desert canyons to glacier-carved valleys, each trip reveals new perspectives.

alaska.title: Alaska
alaska.description: Some of my most challenging and rewarding shoots have been here. The raw wilderness and dramatic light make every expedition an adventure.

arizona.title: Arizona
arizona.description: The Grand Canyon's changing light and the desert's rugged beauty have taught me patience as a photographer. The rewards are worth the wait.

colorado.title: Colorado
colorado.description: My playground for mountain photography. The Rockies offer endless opportunities for dramatic landscapes, especially during wildflower season.

missouri.title: Missouri
missouri.description: Often overlooked, but I've found incredible beauty here. From misty Ozark mornings to golden prairie sunsets, it's full of surprises.

utah.title: Utah
utah.description: My favorite state for desert photography. The red rock formations and slot canyons create otherworldly compositions in the right light.

washington.title: Washington
washington.description: The diversity here amazes me - from rainforest waterfalls to volcanic peaks. The moody Pacific Northwest light adds drama to every shot.

wyoming.title: Wyoming
wyoming.description: Between Yellowstone's geothermal wonders and the Tetons' jagged peaks, this state has given me some of my most iconic images.

vietnam.title: Vietnam
vietnam.description: One of my favorite countries for cultural photography. The mix of traditional life, bustling cities, and stunning landscapes provides endless inspiration.

da-nang.title: Da Nang
da-nang.description: Beyond the iconic Dragon Bridge lighting up over the Han River at blue hour, Da Nang is best known for its stunning beaches. Having lived here for a couple years, I particularly loved capturing the pristine white sands of My Khe Beach at sunrise.

hanoi.title: Hanoi
hanoi.description: The Old Quarter's narrow streets are a street photographer's dream. I never tire of capturing the morning market scenes and colonial architecture.

hoi-an.title: Hoi An
hoi-an.description: My favorite spot for night photography in Vietnam. The ancient town's lantern-lit streets create magical scenes after dark. The surrounding herb gardens and vegetable farms, tended by local families for generations, add a vibrant touch of green to this historic city.

sapa.title: Sapa
sapa.description: The terraced rice fields here have tested my landscape photography skills. The changing seasons and morning mist create endless variations.

cat-ba.title: Cat Ba
cat-ba.description: I love photographing the limestone karsts from different perspectives here. The morning light hitting the cliffs from the water is particularly special.
